stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains the emergence of genocide as an aspect of conflict in twentieth-century Europe?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of contextualizing twentieth-century global conflict.

choicesHtml: The advent of new racial and other ideologies that justified exterminating minority populations
The development of new weapons that enabled the mass killing of civilians
The intensification of overseas imperial competition between European states
The development of new technologies that rendered traditional military strategies obsolete
